entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 12:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SE 35 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 this afternoon except gusting to 80 near the Strait of Georgia late this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h except gusting to 80 near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 near midnight then becoming northwest 20. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
